Module Assignment
Package services

Class SuggestionResponderService

java.lang.Object
services.SuggestionResponderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISuggestionResponderService
public class SuggestionResponderService extends Object implements ISuggestionResponderService
SuggestionResponderService class for managing and responding to suggestions related to a camp. Implements the ISuggestionResponderService interface.

  • Method Details

    • getAllSuggestionsForCamp

      public Map<Integer,Suggestion> getAllSuggestionsForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves all suggestions for a specific camp.
      Specified by:
      getAllSuggestionsForCamp in interface ISuggestionResponderService
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp for which suggestions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Map containing suggestions for the specified camp, keyed by suggestion ID.

    • reviewSuggestion

      public boolean reviewSuggestion(int suggestionID, boolean suggestionStatus)
      Reviews a suggestion and updates its status (Accepted/Rejected).
      Specified by:
      reviewSuggestion in interface ISuggestionResponderService
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of the suggestion to be reviewed.
      suggestionStatus - The status to be set for the suggestion (true for Accepted, false for Rejected).
      Returns:
      True if the suggestion is successfully reviewed and updated, false otherwise.
